section.title: __init__.py
section.programlisting: 00001 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- 00002 # Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. 00003 # See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information. 00004 # SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception 00005 00006 from . import test_libear 00007 from . import test_compilation 00008 from . import test_clang 00009 from . import test_report 00010 from . import test_analyze 00011 from . import test_intercept 00012 from . import test_shell 00013 00014 00015 def load_tests(loader, suite, _): 00016 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_libear)) 00017 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_compilation)) 00018 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_clang)) 00019 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_report)) 00020 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_analyze)) 00021 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_intercept)) 00022 suite.addTests(loader.loadTestsFromModule(test_shell)) 00023 return suite
